title: Opinion: Outgoing Giro d’Italia Donne organizer disrespecting riders, fans by doing bare minimum in 2023
content:
Men's Giro d'Italia organizer RCS will take over next year and has a lot to do to improve the race.

Read the full article at Opinion: Outgoing Giro d’Italia Donne organizer disrespecting riders, fans by doing bare minimum in 2023 on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
